title: Can We Create A Page Having "Nykaa" As Page Type?
description: No, Nykaa Keywork does not Randring on the iOS Devices. Kindly Reconfirm the same before proceeding.

title: Is it mandatory to update correct & accurate Analytical Title?
description: Yes, This would assist in pulling out correct foorprints for individual tile.

title: How to add rupee sign while uploding bulk csv files?
description: You have to use ( â‚¹ ) instead of ₹ rupee Sign.

title: How to make hybrid for Luxe Brands?
description: You will need to create hybrid on the following page type desktop-category-listing, mweb-category-listing, app-category-listing & ultra_lux-app-category-listing.

title: Which App link data needs to be selected for CMS Landing Pages.
description: For Example: https://www.nykaa.com/giftcard/list or https://www.nykaa.com/spin-the-wheel-app/lp this url is a cms link hence we will select the option of landing page.

title: What is the Page Type of the Order Confirmaion Page or Order Confirmaion Mail.
description: The Page Type of Order Confirmaion Page is: 'app-order-confirmation-center' & Order Confirmaion Mail is: 'order-confirmation-mail'

title: What is the Page Type of the Welcome Screen.
description: The Page Type of Welcome Screen is: 'welcome-screen'

title: What is the Prod URL for StoryBook?
description: Please find the Prod URL For Story Book: https://nykaa-widgets.nykaa.com/storybook/?path=/story/preview-service-previews--full-page-preview

title: What is the PreProd URL for StoryBook?
description: Please find the PreProd URL For Story Book: https://nykaa-widgets-staging.nykaa.com/storybook/

title: What is the URL for Inventory Management?
Where we found the header creative for HP Takeover?
description: You Can find the all the header in below folder: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13xOE4ADNMyIlCUjjYFxJ5kEv-Gx2jSEl

title: What is the Page Type for Strem/ IDN Page?
description: Please find the Page Type for IDN: stream-play-explore

title: Where we need to add New Landing Page and Hybrid Page details for Tracking?
description: When we create the new page we need to keep the record in the following sheet for tracking: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sBSk9vj87AoOfuF8YXoKZSi7yt_60hZsdd7ujP9KWYM/edit?gid=1449718981#gid=1449718981

title: What is the Page Type for Beauty Calender?
description: Please find the Page Type for Beauty Calender: live-calendar-page

title: What is the widget id for retail store/ Store and Events Page for banner Changes
description: If you wan't to change or add the banner to retail page, use this widget: '62c666d521d1458ec2bc44cb'.
